import React from 'react'; import { useCart } from '../context/CartContext'; import './Cart.css'; function Cart() { const { cart, dispatch } = useCart(); const removeFromCart = (index) => { dispatch({ type: 'REMOVE_FROM_CART', index }); }; const subtotal = cart.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.price, 0); return (

Cart

Product Price Quantity Subtotal
{item.name} {item.price} 1 {item.price}

Cart Totals

Subtotal: ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}

Total: ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}

); } export default Cart;
